spec_data.Name: python3-ludolph
spec_data.Description:
Monitoring Jabber Bot with Zabbix support, completely written in Python.

Features
* Simple and modular design
* Alerts from Zabbix
* Multi-User Chat (XEP-0045)
* Colorful messages (XEP-0071)
* Attention (XEP-0224)
* Avatars (XEP-0084)
* Roster management and ACL configuration
* Webhooks and Cron jobs
* Plugins and commands
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 08 Sep 2017 05:37:42 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
